p: During pilot implementation, the DLMEP demonstrated that EBS in healthcare facilities can be practical and easy to implement and that health facility staff will engage in rapid detection and notification when provided with simple guidance and a clear reporting mechanism. While the reporting from the clinical to public health sectors can be a challenge worldwide, 20, 21, 22 EBS can contribute to improving hospital‚Äêbased immediate reporting of health events. The description of EBS implementation presented here can serve as a model for other public health jurisdictions interested in strengthening immediate reporting and notification from health facilities.
